# Problem 1

Prior Distribution:
\newline
\[
\begin{aligned}
p(\theta) & = p(\mu)p(\phi)p(\tau) \\
& = \frac{1}{\sqrt{200\pi}}e^{-\frac{1}{2\times100}\mu^2} \times \frac{1}{\sqrt{200\pi}}e^{-\frac{1}{2\times100}\phi^2} \times
\frac{0.01^0.01}{\Gamma(0.01)}\tau^{0.01 - 1}e^{-0.01\tau} \\
& \propto e^{\mu^2} \times e^{\phi^2} \times \tau^{-0.99}e^{-0.01\tau} \\
& = e^{\mu^2 + \phi^2 - 0.01\tau}\tau^{-0.99}
\end{aligned}
\]
Likelihood:
\newline
\[
\begin{aligned}
p(y|\theta) & = \frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2}}e^{-\frac{1}{2\sigma^2}y^2} \\
& \propto e^{-\frac{y^2}{2\sigma^2}} \\
\end{aligned}
\]
Posterior Distribution:
\newline
\[
\begin{aligned}
p(\theta|y) & \propto p(y|\theta)p(\theta) \\
& \propto e^{-\frac{y^2}{2\sigma^2}} \times e^{\mu^2 + \phi^2 - 0.01\tau}\tau^{-0.99} \\
& \propto e^{\mu^2 + \phi^2 - 0.01\tau - \frac{y^2}{2\sigma^2}}\tau^{-0.99}
\end{aligned}
\]
